import{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{enrichCocktail}from"../actions";// Hook for getting cocktail enrichment details
function useEnrichCocktail(cocktail){var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){cocktail&&dispatch(enrichCocktail(cocktail));},[dispatch,cocktail]);}export default useEnrichCocktail;
